title.1: NO PICTURES MATCHED TO YOUR CRITERIA

about.title: ABOUT ART GALLERY
about.text: To study, preserve, represent and popularize the art. To make people's lives better by opening wide access to masterpieces of multinational world art.
about.text1: We believe that art, enlightenment and creativity change people's lives for the better. We glorify domestic artists and recognize the great responsibility for the continuation of the Galleries' traditions, that are related to the preservation of the collection for future generations. We consistently adhere to the principles of openness and accessibility.
about.subscription: Subscribe to newsletter and hear about events, collection from Art Gallery
